text:
Vagit Yusufovich Alekperov (,; born 1 September 1950) is an Azerbaijani and Russian businessman. He is the president of the leading Russian oil company LUKOIL.
As of 2019 he was seen by "Forbes" magazine as the third richest person in Russia with a net worth of $21.1 billion and the 46th richest person in the world.
